column2: function determines whether the passed value is a finite number.
function determines whether a value is NaN or not
parses an argument (converting it to a string first if needed) and returns a floating point number
function parses a string argument and returns an integer of the specified radix (the base in mathematical numeral systems)
returns the length of a string
method returns the index of (the position of) the first occurrence of a specified text in a string
method returns the index of the last occurrence of a specified text in a string
method searches a string for a specified value and returns the position of the match
extracts a part of a string and returns the extracted part in a new string
method replaces a specified value with another value in a string
converts an array to a string of (comma separated) array values
method also joins all array elements into a string
method adds a new element to an array (at the beginning), and "unshifts" older elements
